H0.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Fiat

H1.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Renault

H2.text: Which other car company owns Seat. Peugeot

H3.text: Which other car company owns Seat. VW

A4.text: In 1990—after purchasing its entire equity—Volkswagen AG took over the full ownership of SEAT, making the company a wholly owned subsidiary.
